channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for MN
channel.description: The latest Form 5800.1 hazardous material reports submitted to the Department of Transportation and posted online by the Pipeline and Hazardous Materials Safety Administration, for MN

item.title: Report E-2023090412
item.description:
Report E-2023090412

Identified by scraper @ 2023-09-19T15:12:14+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-08-31
  • City: LAKEVILLE
  • State: MN
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: FEDEX FREIGHT, INC.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: Associate did not block and/or brace freight properly for transport. Freight was crushed causing release of product.

item.title: Report E-2023090393
item.description:
Report E-2023090393

Identified by scraper @ 2023-09-19T15:12:14+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-08-18
  • City: EAGAN
  • State: MN
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: XPO LOGISTICS FREIGHT, INC.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: During off loading the warehouse crew accidentally put a forklift fork into the one 330 gallon porta feed poly tote of 3D Trasar (un3264) releasing 15 gallons of product. Contractors were dispatched for the cleanup and containment of the release.

item.title: Report X-2023081257
item.description:
Report X-2023081257

Identified by scraper @ 2023-09-19T15:12:14+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-08-16
  • City: SAINT PAUL
  • State: MN
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: PACKAGE FOUND WET AND LEAKING FROM BOTTOM OF BOX. DescribePack: 1 PLASTIC GALLON BOTTLE PUNCTURED NEAR BOTTOM. DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: LEAKING LIQUID OUT.

item.title: Report X-2023081192
item.description:
Report X-2023081192

Identified by scraper @ 2023-09-18T15:13:15+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-08-14
  • City: ROGERS
  • State: MN
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: driver placed a code 10 on the package upon noticing it was damaged and placed it on a shelf with bottles upright during the remainder of the route. they returned to the station. the van line manager called out the damaged hazmat as soon as he became aware of it. HESS specialist responded and retrieved it in a lined tote, bringing it back to the damage area and placing it atop the drain mats in the incoming damaged hazmat/LQ area. in-house cleanup, awaiting disposition. DescribePack: two bottles leaked due to loose caps. DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: bottles kept upright during van drive. upon its return to station, placed in lined tote, moved to drain mats.
